Name: Happy Grumps
About the game: Spread Happiness through line of sight in this grid-based dungeon crawler and join forces with liberated Grumps to clear rooms in turn-based gameplay. Each run is randomly generated with new combinations of maps, trinkets, and strategies. Unlock new heroes, powers, and secrets through your growing skills and victories!
